-----------------------------------------------------------------


The Man With the Iron Fists is a fight film that marks the debut of rapper RZA as a film director. The plot, written by RZA and Eli Roth, centers on a blacksmith (RZA) who makes weapons for a small village in feudal China. Something happens and he is forced to defend himself and the local peasants. Russell Crowe (who worked RZA in American Gangster) lives the villain. Lucy Liu (Kung Fu Panda), Rick Yune and Jamie Chung are also in the cast, among others. Quentin Tarantino is the producer of the film.
